DOC.brief_summary: The aim is to verify, whether intraoperative temporary clipping of the uterine vessels with vascular clips can reduce blood loss significantly.
DOC.brief_title: Temporary Clipping of the Uterine Arteries During Laparoscopic Myomectomy
